scripts.copy-html: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['login.html', 'signup.html', 'profile.html', 'src/styles/style.css', 'src/pages/login.js', 'src/pages/signup.js', 'src/pages/profile.js'].forEach(f => { const dest = 'dist/' + f; const dir = dest.substring(0, dest.lastIndexOf('/')); if (!fs.existsSync(dir)) fs.mkdirSync(dir, { recursive: true }); fs.copyFileSync(f, dest); });"
